Subroutine vom_rootuptake

1106 : 
1107 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1108 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1109 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1110 : !*-----root water uptake------------------------------------------------
1111 : 
1112 :       subroutine vom_rootuptake ()
1113 :       use vegwatmod
1114 :       use vegmod
1115 :       use watmod
1116 :       implicit none
1117 : 
1118 :       INTEGER :: i
1119 : 
1120 :       if (nlayersnew .ge. 1) then
1121 :         postemp_ = MIN(pos_, nlayers_)
1122 :         do i = 1, postemp_
1123 :           phydrostaticvec(i) = (i - 0.5d0) * delz_  ! (Out[238]) hydrostatic head for (3.34)
1124 :         enddo
1125 :         if (md_.gt.0.d0) then
1126 :           prootmvec(1:postemp_) = (mpbar * (-mq_ + mqx_) * (750.d0       &
1127 :      &                        - (750.d0 * mqx_) / (md_ + mqx_) + (md_  &
1128 :      &                        + mqx_) / mqx_)) / (md_ + mqx_)          &
1129 :      &                        - phydrostaticvec(1:postemp_)  ! (Out[239])
1130 :         else
1131 :          prootmvec(1:postemp_) = prootmg      ! set tissue suction to the same as in grasses, if no storage capacity
1132 :         endif
1133 : !       * soil resistance, (Out[ 241] with svolume=omgu*delzvec(1:postemp_)); derived from (3.32)
1134 :         rsoilvec(1:postemp_) = SQRT(Pi / 2.d0) * SQRT((rootrad         &
1135 :      &                        * delzvec(1:postemp_))                   &
1136 :      &                       / rsurfvec(1:postemp_))                   &
1137 :      &                       / kunsatvec(1:postemp_)
1138 : 
1139 : !       * root water uptake, Chapter 3.3.3.3 (Out[242])
1140 :         if (md_ .gt. 0.d0) then
1141 :           ruptkvec(1:postemp_) = (-pcapvec(1:postemp_)                   &
1142 :      &                         + prootmvec(1:postemp_))                  &
1143 :      &                         * rsurfvec(1:postemp_) / (rrootm          &
1144 :      &                         + rsoilvec(1:postemp_))
1145 :           ruptkvec(postemp_+1:M___) = 0.d0
1146 :         else      ! if no storage, uptake happens only when etm__>0
1147 :           if (etm__ .gt. 0.d0) then
1148 :             ruptkvec(1:postemp_) = MAX(0.d0,(-pcapvec(1:postemp_)        &
1149 :      &                         + prootmvec(1:postemp_))                  &
1150 :      &                         * rsurfvec(1:postemp_) / (rrootm          &
1151 :      &                         + rsoilvec(1:postemp_)))
1152 :             ruptkvec(postemp_+1:M___) = 0.d0
1153 :             
1154 :             if (SUM(ruptkvec(:)) .gt. 0.d0) then
1155 :               if (etm__ .gt. SUM(ruptkvec(:))) then
1156 :                 changef = 1.d0
1157 :                 etm__   = SUM(ruptkvec(:))
1158 :                 transp_ = etm__ * 55555.555555555555d0  ! (Out[249]) mol/s=m/s*10^6 g/m/(18g/mol)
1159 :                 gstom__ = transp_ / (a__ * vd__)
1160 :               endif
1161 :               ! Setting SUM(ruptkvec)=etm__ and distributing according to relative uptake:
1162 :               ruptkvec(:) = etm__ * (ruptkvec(:) / (SUM(ruptkvec(:)))) 
1163 :             else
1164 :               ruptkvec(:) = 0.d0
1165 :               changef     = 1.d0
1166 :               etm__       = 0.d0
1167 :               transp_     = 0.d0
1168 :               gstom__     = 0.d0
1169 :             endif
1170 :              
1171 :           else
1172 :             ruptkvec(:) = 0.d0
1173 :           endif
1174 :         endif  
1175 : 
1176 :         postempg = MIN(posg, nlayers_)
1177 :         if (MAXVAL(etmg__(:,:)) .gt. 0.d0) then
1178 : !         * root uptake by grasses can not be negative, as storage negligible
1179 :           ruptkg(1:posg) = MAX(0.d0,((-pcapvec(1:postempg)             &
1180 :      &                   + (prootmg - phydrostaticvec(1:postempg)))    &
1181 :      &                   * rsurfg_(:)) / (rrootm + (SQRT(Pi / 2.d0)    &
1182 :      &                   * SQRT(rootrad * delzvec(1:postempg)          &
1183 :      &                   / rsurfg_(:))) / kunsatvec(1:postempg)))
1184 :           ruptkg(postempg+1:M___) = 0.d0
1185 :           if (SUM(ruptkg(:)) .gt. 0.d0) then
1186 :             where (etmg__(:,:) .gt. SUM(ruptkg(:)))
1187 :               rootlim(:,:)  = 1.d0
1188 :               etmg__(:,:)   = SUM(ruptkg(:))
1189 :               transpg(:,:)  = etmg__(:,:) * 55555.555555555555d0  ! (Out[249]) mol/s=m/s*10^6 g/m/(18g/mol)
1190 :               gstomg__(:,:) = transpg(:,:) / (a__ * vd__)
1191 :             end where
1192 :             ruptkg(1:postempg) = etmg__(2,2) * (ruptkg(1:postempg)     &
1193 :      &                         / (SUM(ruptkg(:))))
1194 :           else
1195 :             ruptkg(:)      = 0.d0
1196 :             etmg__(:,:)    = 0.d0
1197 :             transpg(:,:)   = 0.d0
1198 :             gstomg__(:,:)  = 0.d0
1199 :           endif
1200 :         else
1201 :           ruptkg(:) = 0.d0
1202 :         endif
1203 :       else
1204 :         ruptkg(:)     = 0.d0
1205 :         ruptkvec(:)   = 0.d0
1206 :         etmg__(:,:)   = 0.d0
1207 :         transpg(:,:)  = 0.d0
1208 :         gstomg__(:,:) = 0.d0
1209 :       endif
1210 : 
1211 :       return
1212 :       end subroutine vom_rootuptake
